quote: As the Athenians to the Pnyx, the antique Romans to the Campus Martius, or our Nordic ancestors to the All-Thing, so the folk of Tilling flocked to the High Street for extempore parliament.
quote_letters: AS THE ATHENIANS TO THE PNYX THE ANTIQUE ROMANS TO THE CAMPUS MARTIUS OR OUR NORDIC ANCESTORS TO THE ALL-THING SO THE FOLK OF TILLING FLOCKED TO THE HIGH STREET FOR EXTEMPORE PARLIAMENT
